Technical tip: To
Apply sucrose solutions,
Place a 200 μl pipet tip on the end of a 1000 μl pipet tip containing 1 ml sucrose solution.
Hold both tips steady using gloved fingers.
Place the 200 μl tip in contact with the inside wall of the ultra

Ultra

7. Repeat step 6 until six fractions of 2 mL each have been collected.
Add 9mL PBS to each of the 2 ml fractions.

The third fraction from the top, which contains the interface of the 34% and 40% sucrose solutions, should be enriched for exosomes.
The sixth fraction, which contains the interface of the 70% and 82% sucrose solutions, will contain protein/RNA/membrane aggregates.
